it.officinerobotiche.serial

Class SerialPacket

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.officinerobotiche.serial.SerialPacket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gnu.io.SerialPortEventListener, java.util.EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SerialFrame

    public class SerialPacket
extends java.lang.Object
implements gnu.io.SerialPortEventListener
    Object to send and receive a Packet object from serial port with O-RB protocol.

    • Method Detail

      • availableSerialPorts

        public static java.util.HashSet<gnu.io.CommPortIdentifier> availableSerialPorts()
        Find all serial port avaible.
        Returns:
        A HashSet containing the CommPortIdentifier for all serial ports that are not currently being used.

      • serialEvent

        public void serialEvent(gnu.io.SerialPortEvent oEvent)
        Event to decode byte received from serial. We have two fases for decode packet. The first one, receive all byte and create by function readByte a new Packet. Finally if data is correctly decoded, start a function decodePkg, for parsing all messages in Packet.
        Specified by:
        serialEvent in interface gnu.io.SerialPortEventListener
        Parameters:
        oEvent - type of event received from serial

      • close

        public void close()
        This should be called when you stop using the port. This will prevent port locking on platforms like Linux.
